For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell’s school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

jluXgJ7dG39ONk0R.name: Mirror Image
jluXgJ7dG39ONk0R.description:
Three illusory duplicates of yourself appear in your space. Until the spell ends, the duplicates move with you and mimic your actions, shifting position so it’s impossible to track which image is real.

Each time a creature hits you with an attack roll during the spell’s duration, roll a [[/r (@flags.dnd-players-handbook.mirrorImages)d6kh1cs>2#Duplicate destroyed]]{d6 for each} of your remaining duplicates. If any of the d6s rolls a 3 or higher, one of the duplicates is hit instead of you, and the duplicate is destroyed. The duplicates otherwise ignore all other damage and effects. The spell ends when all three duplicates are destroyed.

A creature is unaffected by this spell if it has the &Reference[blinded apply=false] condition, &Reference[blindsight], or &Reference[truesight].

jqTr67vwvVDIqt7t.name: Tongues
jqTr67vwvVDIqt7t.description: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken or signed language that it hears or sees. Moreover, when the target communicates by speaking or signing, any creature that knows at least one language can understand it if that creature can hear the speech or see the signing.

juTK6jd3xDb5xZba.name: Multiattack
juTK6jd3xDb5xZba.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two attacks, using [[/item .jmtfmb8isTfURSSq]] or [[/item .zhyJH2fjFrdV5nRI]] in any combination.

jxEalODbsK7YCkTP.name: Mind Spike
jxEalODbsK7YCkTP.description:
You drive a spike of psionic energy into the mind of one creature you can see within range. The target makes a Wisdom saving throw, taking 3d8 Psychic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed save, you also always know the target’s location until the spell ends, but only while the two of you are on the same plane of existence. While you have this knowledge, the target can’t become hidden from you, and if it has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition, it gains no benefit from that condition against you.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 2.

k01UQZt8LBInnn6u.name: Undead Restoration
k01UQZt8LBInnn6u.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed, it reforms and regains all its Hit Points in [[/r 1d10]] days unless a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell is cast on its remains.

k0eU3EIGLCIUzIni.name: Invisibility
k0eU3EIGLCIUzIni.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

k5sfigHl2VsEaN4o.name: Commune
k5sfigHl2VsEaN4o.description:
You contact a deity or a divine proxy and ask up to three questions that can be answered with yes or no. You must ask your questions before the spell ends. You receive a correct answer for each question.

Divine beings aren’t necessarily omniscient, so you might receive “unclear” as an answer if a question pertains to information that lies beyond the deity’s knowledge. In a case where a one-word answer could be misleading or contrary to the deity’s interests, the DM might offer a short phrase as an answer instead.

If you cast the spell more than once before finishing a Long Rest, there is a cumulative 25 percent chance for each casting after the first that you get no answer.

kBI2qYix7GyXmhaD.name: World-Shaking Movement
kBI2qYix7GyXmhaD.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed. At the end of this movement, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] creates an instantaneous shock wave in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=g4W0ovZxBeUrZKb8]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=g4W0ovZxBeUrZKb8]]. Emanation originating from itself. Creatures in that area lose &Reference[Concentration] and, if Medium or smaller, have the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

kJxdj680Yr2u1vqp.name: Mage Armor
kJxdj680Yr2u1vqp.description: You touch a willing creature who isn’t wearing armor. Until the spell ends, the target’s base AC becomes 13 plus its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends early if the target dons armor.

kOKHbZktHfRffihQ.name: Detect Thoughts
kOKHbZktHfRffihQ.description:
You activate one of the effects below. Until the spell ends, you can activate either effect as a Magic action on your later turns.

Sense Thoughts. You sense the presence of thoughts within 30 feet of yourself that belong to creatures that know languages or are telepathic. You don’t read the thoughts, but you know that a thinking creature is present.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

Read Thoughts. Target one creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself or one creature within 30 feet of yourself that you detected with the Sense Thoughts option. You learn what is most on the target’s mind right now. If the target doesn’t know any languages and isn’t telepathic, you learn nothing.

As a Magic action on your next turn, you can try to probe deeper into the target’s mind. If you probe deeper, the target makes a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, you discern the target’s reasoning, emotions, and something that looms large in its mind (such as a worry, love, or hate). On a successful save, the spell ends. Either way, the target knows that you are probing into its mind, and until you shift your attention away from the target’s mind, the target can take an action on its turn to make an [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC, ending the spell on a success.

kPLdXUnQxMINrwVs.name: Detect Magic
kPLdXUnQxMINrwVs.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell’s school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

kUzXgVwiKDTtw9Mo.name: Identify
kUzXgVwiKDTtw9Mo.description:
You touch an object throughout the spell’s casting. If the object is a magic item or some other magical object, you learn its properties and how to use them, whether it requires Attunement, and how many charges it has, if any. You learn whether any ongoing spells are affecting the item and what they are. If the item was created by a spell, you learn that spell’s name.

If you instead touch a creature throughout the casting, you learn which ongoing spells, if any, are currently affecting it.

kYsTzM5cuWinvQqm.name: Druidcraft
kYsTzM5cuWinvQqm.description:
Whispering to the spirits of nature, you create one of the following effects within range.

Weather Sensor. You create a Tiny, harmless sensory effect that predicts what the weather will be at your location for the next 24 hours. The effect might manifest as a golden orb for clear skies, a cloud for rain, falling snowflakes for snow, and so on. This effect persists for 1 round.

Bloom. You instantly make a flower blossom, a seed pod open, or a leaf bud bloom.

Sensory Effect. You create a harmless sensory effect, such as falling leaves, spectral dancing fairies, a gentle breeze, the sound of an animal, or the faint odor of skunk. The effect must fit in a 5-foot Cube.

Fire Play. You light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a campfire.

kdc53KLaLU9CW6dh.name: Thunderwave
kdc53KLaLU9CW6dh.description:
You unleash a wave of thunderous energy. Each creature in a 15-foot Cube originating from you makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 Thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

In addition, unsecured objects that are entirely within the Cube are pushed 10 feet away from you, and a thunderous boom is audible within 300 feet.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 1.

kezlv2DiF5RSQ1sm.name: Detect Magic
kezlv2DiF5RSQ1sm.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell’s school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

kiSJTCgeflbQIcAL.name: Dispel Evil and Good
kiSJTCgeflbQIcAL.description:
For the duration, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. You can end the spell early by using either of the following special functions.

Break Enchantment. As a Magic action, you touch a creature that is possessed by or has the &Reference[Charmed] or &Reference[Frightened] condition from one or more creatures of the types above. The target is no longer possessed, Charmed, or Frightened by such creatures.

Dismissal. As a Magic action, you target one creature you can see within 5 feet of you that has one of the creature types above. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be sent back to its home plane if it isn’t there already. If they aren’t on their home plane, Undead are sent to the Shadowfell, and Fey are sent to the Feywild.

ko31Vae4lE8qo5Ez.name: Lash
ko31Vae4lE8qo5Ez.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one Tentacle attack.

l0WYWl6FK1SECMdt.name: Mass Suggestion
l0WYWl6FK1SECMdt.description:
You suggest a course of activity—described in no more than 25 words—to twelve or fewer creatures you can see within range that can hear and understand you. The suggestion must sound achievable and not involve anything that would obviously deal damage to any of the targets or their allies. For example, you could say, “Walk to the village down that road, and help the villagers there harvest crops until sunset.” Or you could say, “Now is not the time for violence. Drop your weapons, and dance! Stop in an hour.”

Each target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for the duration or until you or your allies deal damage to the target. Each Charmed target pursues the suggestion to the best of its ability. The suggested activity can continue for the entire duration, but if the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends for a target upon completing it.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The duration is longer with a spell slot of level 7 (10 days), 8 (30 days), or 9 (366 days).

l0WZu9LBJQIAS2h8.name: Synaptic Static
l0WZu9LBJQIAS2h8.description:
You cause psychic energy to erupt at a point within range. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point makes an Intelligence saving throw, taking 8d6 Psychic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

On a failed save, a target also has muddled thoughts for 1 minute. During that time, it subtracts [[/r 1d6]] from all its attack rolls and ability checks, as well as any Constitution saving throws to maintain Concentration. The target makes an [[/save ability=int dc=@attributes.spell.dc format=long]] at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

l6QBJ7Y0NAqE3rnq.name: Water Breathing
l6QBJ7Y0NAqE3rnq.description: This spell grants up to ten willing creatures of your choice within range the ability to breathe underwater until the spell ends. Affected creatures also retain their normal mode of respiration.

l7t8gpKOgNTYTAOy.name: Shapechange
l7t8gpKOgNTYTAOy.description:
You shape-shift into another creature for the duration or until you take a Magic action to shape-shift into a different eligible form. The new form must be of a creature that has a Challenge Rating no higher than your level or Challenge Rating. You must have seen the sort of creature before, and it can’t be a Construct or an Undead.

When you shape-shift, you gain a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to the Hit Points of the form. The spell ends early if you have no Temporary Hit Points left.

Your game statistics are replaced by the stat block of the chosen form, but you retain your creature type; alignment; personality; Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; Hit Points; Hit Point Dice; proficiencies; and ability to communicate. If you have the Spellcasting feature, you retain it too.

Upon shape-shifting, you determine whether your equipment drops to the ground or changes in size and shape to fit the new form while you’re in it.

l8GMJ6k59lHUroQN.name: Animal Friendship
l8GMJ6k59lHUroQN.description:
Target a Beast that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the &Reference[charmed apply=false] condition for the duration. If you or one of your allies deals damage to the target, the spells ends.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional Beast for each spell slot level above 1.

lEwU9noV1vvPbENv.name: Prestidigitation
lEwU9noV1vvPbENv.description:
You create a magical effect within range. Choose the effect from the options below. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its non-instantaneous effects active at a time.

Sensory Effect. You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as a shower of sparks, a puff of wind, faint musical notes, or an odd odor.

Fire Play. You instantaneously light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire.

Clean or Soil. You instantaneously clean or soil an object no larger than 1 cubic foot.

Minor Sensation. You chill, warm, or flavor up to 1 cubic foot of nonliving material for 1 hour.

Magic Mark. You make a color, a small mark, or a symbol appear on an object or a surface for 1 hour.

Minor Creation. You create a nonmagical trinket or an illusory image that can fit in your hand. It lasts until the end of your next turn. A trinket can deal no damage and has no monetary worth.

lJ0WsCTDWAMXkc03.name: Hellish Rebuke
lJ0WsCTDWAMXkc03.description:
The creature that damaged you is momentarily surrounded by green flames. It makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d10 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d10 for each spell slot level above 1.

lNdiEuYQ2WarE6UR.name: Cure Wounds
lNdiEuYQ2WarE6UR.description:
A creature you touch regains a number of Hit Points equal to 2d8 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The healing increases by 2d8 for each spell slot level above 1.

lPlB7NmujNipH61R.name: Shortsword
lPlB7NmujNipH61R.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], plus plus 10 (3d6) Piercing damage if the attack was made with Advantage.

lQDlH8pdy1WcUTMT.name: Minor Illusion
lQDlH8pdy1WcUTMT.description:
You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration. See the descriptions below for the effects of each. The illusion ends if you cast this spell again.

If a creature takes a Study action to examine the sound or image, the creature can determine that it is an illusion with a successful [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the illusion becomes faint to the creature.

Sound. If you create a sound, its volume can range from a whisper to a scream. It can be your voice, someone else’s voice, a lion’s roar, a beating of drums, or any other sound you choose. The sound continues unabated throughout the duration, or you can make discrete sounds at different times before the spell ends.

Image. If you create an image of an object—such as a chair, muddy footprints, or a small chest—it must be no larger than a 5-foot Cube. The image can’t create sound, light, smell, or any other sensory effect. Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, since things can pass through it.

lSbRnSVRWsTQoh2w.name: Misty Step
lSbRnSVRWsTQoh2w.description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

lUJ9dc6cS9834GvY.name: Guiding Bolt
lUJ9dc6cS9834GvY.description:
You hurl a bolt of light toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, it takes 4d6 Radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against it before the end of your next turn has Advantage.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 1.

lW727bG08kyjFnVf.name: Feather Fall
lW727bG08kyjFnVf.description: Choose up to five falling creatures within range. A falling creature’s rate of descent slows to 60 feet per round until the spell ends. If a creature lands before the spell ends, the creature takes no damage from the fall, and the spell ends for that creature.
lW727bG08kyjFnVf.materials_component: a small feather or piece of down

lWC2jp0sRaJILIwH.name: Unicorn's Blessing
lWC2jp0sRaJILIwH.description: The [[lookup @name]] touches another creature with its horn and casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration} on that creature, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

leUcbtUfszTZvsrL.name: Identify
leUcbtUfszTZvsrL.description:
You touch an object throughout the spell’s casting. If the object is a magic item or some other magical object, you learn its properties and how to use them, whether it requires Attunement, and how many charges it has, if any. You learn whether any ongoing spells are affecting the item and what they are. If the item was created by a spell, you learn that spell’s name.

If you instead touch a creature throughout the casting, you learn which ongoing spells, if any, are currently affecting it.

lglvYkZZuNa2mBbW.name: Hold Monster
lglvYkZZuNa2mBbW.description:
Choose a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Paralyzed condition for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the spell on itself on a success.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 5.

liK9CYrnL3t4Ax8t.name: Dispel Evil and Good
liK9CYrnL3t4Ax8t.description:
For the duration, Celestials, Elementals, Fey, Fiends, and Undead have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. You can end the spell early by using either of the following special functions.

Break Enchantment. As a Magic action, you touch a creature that is possessed by or has the &Reference[Charmed] or &Reference[Frightened] condition from one or more creatures of the types above. The target is no longer possessed, Charmed, or Frightened by such creatures.

Dismissal. As a Magic action, you target one creature you can see within 5 feet of you that has one of the creature types above. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be sent back to its home plane if it isn’t there already. If they aren’t on their home plane, Undead are sent to the Shadowfell, and Fey are sent to the Feywild.

lkihd8odH5R2QqJG.name: Spike Growth
lkihd8odH5R2QqJG.description:
The ground in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within range sprouts hard spikes and thorns. The area becomes Difficult Terrain for the duration. When a creature moves into or within the area, it takes [[/damage 2d4 type=piercing]] damage for every 5 feet it travels.

The transformation of the ground is camouflaged to look natural. Any creature that can’t see the area when the spell is cast must take a Search action and succeed on a [[/check ability=wis skill=prc dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] or [[/check ability=wis skill=sur dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC to recognize the terrain as hazardous before entering it.

lmC6TZYCjZ8pTJxz.name: Invisibility
lmC6TZYCjZ8pTJxz.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

lmHO09uRagHdxtGo.name: Dispel Magic
lmHO09uRagHdxtGo.description:
Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any ongoing spell of level 3 or lower on the target ends. For each ongoing spell of level 4 or higher on the target, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability (DC 10 plus that spell’s level). On a successful check, the spell ends.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You automatically end a spell on the target if the spell’s level is equal to or less than the level of the spell slot you use.

lqG4KueiyzdOy01v.name: Animate Trees
lqG4KueiyzdOy01v.description: The [[lookup @name]] magically animates up to two trees it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=EceTNjzjKWdrMNAy]] feet of itself. Each tree uses the Treant stat block, except it has Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, it can't speak, and it lacks this action. The tree takes its turn immediately after the treant on the same initiative count, and it obeys the treant. A tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies, the treant dies, or it is more than 120 feet from the treant. The tree then takes root if possible.

m5izCrQWVAYsov4b.name: Major Image
m5izCrQWVAYsov4b.description:
You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 20-foot Cube. The image appears at a spot that you can see within range and lasts for the duration. It seems real, including sounds, smells, and temperature appropriate to the thing depicted, but it can’t deal damage or cause conditions.

If you are within range of the illusion, you can take a Magic action to cause the image to move to any other spot within range. As the image changes location, you can alter its appearance so that its movements appear natural for the image. For example, if you create an image of a creature and move it, you can alter the image so that it appears to be walking. Similarly, you can cause the illusion to make different sounds at different times, even making it carry on a conversation, for example.

Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, for things can pass through it. A creature that takes a Study action to examine the image can determine that it is an illusion with a successful [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the creature can see through the image, and its other sensory qualities become faint to the creature.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The spell lasts until dispelled, without requiring Concentration, if cast with a level 4+ spell slot.

mIoPzMeNVQ3Zy5Jn.name: Ice Knife
mIoPzMeNVQ3Zy5Jn.description:
You create a shard of ice and fling it at one creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 Piercing damage. Hit or miss, the shard then explodes. The target and each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d6 Cold damage.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The Cold damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 1.
mIoPzMeNVQ3Zy5Jn.materials_component: a drop of water or a piece of ice

mPM1yrHMPklU8VcP.name: Cone of Cold
mPM1yrHMPklU8VcP.description:
You unleash a blast of cold air. Each creature in a 60-foot Cone originating from you makes a Constitution saving throw, taking 8d8 Cold damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature killed by this spell becomes a frozen statue until it thaws.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 5.
mPM1yrHMPklU8VcP.materials_component: a small crystal or glass cone

mPMsVnGpMgQ8utsG.name: Detect Magic
mPMsVnGpMgQ8utsG.description:
For the duration, you sense the presence of magical effects within 30 feet of yourself. If you sense such effects, you can take the Magic action to see a faint aura around any visible creature or object in the area that bears the magic, and if an effect was created by a spell, you learn the spell’s school of magic.

The spell is blocked by 1 foot of stone, dirt, or wood; 1 inch of metal; or a thin sheet of lead.

mc4DCR0R8wG3bVk8.name: Lightning Bolt
mc4DCR0R8wG3bVk8.description:
A stroke of lightning forming a 100-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line blasts out from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the Line makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 8d6 Lightning damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d6 for each spell slot level above 3.
mc4DCR0R8wG3bVk8.materials_component: a bit of fur and a crystal rod

md7g1ZuXxyZpzT28.name: Undead Fortitude
md7g1ZuXxyZpzT28.description: If damage reduces the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to 0 Hit Points, it makes a Constitution saving throw (DC 5 plus the damage taken) unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a successful save, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 1 Hit Point instead.

meMOGWEoFYLwnRpI.name: Minor Illusion
meMOGWEoFYLwnRpI.description:
You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration. See the descriptions below for the effects of each. The illusion ends if you cast this spell again.

If a creature takes a Study action to examine the sound or image, the creature can determine that it is an illusion with a successful [[/check ability=int skill=inv dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the illusion becomes faint to the creature.

Sound. If you create a sound, its volume can range from a whisper to a scream. It can be your voice, someone else’s voice, a lion’s roar, a beating of drums, or any other sound you choose. The sound continues unabated throughout the duration, or you can make discrete sounds at different times before the spell ends.

Image. If you create an image of an object—such as a chair, muddy footprints, or a small chest—it must be no larger than a 5-foot Cube. The image can’t create sound, light, smell, or any other sensory effect. Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, since things can pass through it.

mlQKThc8jqEWdOli.name: Mage Hand
mlQKThc8jqEWdOli.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

When you cast the spell, you can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial.

As a Magic action on your later turns, you can control the hand thus again. As part of that action, you can move the hand up to 30 feet.

The hand can’t attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

mmAbduct00000000.name: Abduct
mmAbduct00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] needn’t spend extra movement to move a creature it is grappling.

mmAberrantGround.name: Aberrant Ground
mmAberrantGround.description: The ground in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zVznqPXgYjETqpQz]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name]] is &Reference[Difficult Terrain].

mmAbsorbBody0000.name: Absorb Body
mmAbsorbBody0000.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YqWqaRXxaKFCH6P8]], one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=YqWqaRXxaKFCH6P8]] [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=YqWqaRXxaKFCH6P8]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within 5 feet.

Failure: The target is pulled into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space and becomes grafted to its body. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one target grafted at a time.

While grafted, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and Disadvantage on Constitution saving throws. When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the grafted target moves with it. If [[lookup @activation.condition activity=KXQbdk3TH6uZex2L]], its body is destroyed, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[lookup @healing.formula activity=KXQbdk3TH6uZex2L]] Hit Points.

The grafted target or a creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@abilities.str.dc format=long]]. On a successful check, the target is no longer grafted and moves to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

mmAcidAbsorption.name: Acid Absorption
mmAcidAbsorption.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to &Reference[Acid] damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Acid damage dealt.

mmAcidBreath0000.name: Acid Breath
mmAcidBreath0000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]]-foot-long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]]-foot-wide Line.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]] damage.

mmAcidSpray00000.name: Acid Spray
mmAcidSpray00000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]]-long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]]-wide [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmAdhesive000000.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
mmAdhesive000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have Disadvantage.

mmAdvancedTelepa.name: Advanced Telepathy
mmAdvancedTelepa.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] perceives the content of any telepathic communication within 60 feet of it.

mmAgile000000000.name: Agile
mmAgile000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t provoke an &Reference[opportunityattacks]{Opportunity Attack} when it moves out of an enemy’s reach.

mmAim00000000000.name: Aim
mmAim00000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on the next attack roll it makes during the current turn.

mmAirForm0000000.name: Air Form
mmAirForm0000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can enter an enemy’s space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

mmAmorphous00000.name: Amorphous
mmAmorphous00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

mmAmphibious0000.name: Amphibious
mmAmphibious0000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water.

mmAnimalLordship.name: Animal Lordship
mmAnimalLordship.description:
An [[lookup @name lowercase]] represents a Forager, Hunter, or Sage (DM’s choice), which determines certain traits in this stat block.

Appearance Tables

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.tables.RollTable.mmForagerAnimalL rollable classes="caption-top" cite=false]{Forager Animal Lord Appearances}

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.tables.RollTable.mmHunterAnimalLo rollable classes="caption-top" cite=false]{Hunter Animal Lord Appearances}

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.tables.RollTable.mmSageAnimalLord rollable classes="caption-top" cite=false]{Sage Animal Lord Appearances}

mmAnimalSpirit00.name: Animal Spirit
mmAnimalSpirit00.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] conjures an animal spirit that strikes at a creature and then disappears.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=cx21u9ZYjSdu2m3U]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=cx21u9ZYjSdu2m3U]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: One of the following effects occurs:

Fortify (Forager Only). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains [[lookup @healing.formula activity=emHqEek8e9Mwyaj7]] Temporary Hit Points.

Marked as Prey (Hunter Only). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls against the target until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Pesky Swarm (Sage Only). The target has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

mmAnimateBoulder.name: Animate Boulders
mmAnimateBoulder.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] animates [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=lydBv987ChZ7itoS]] it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=lydBv987ChZ7itoS]] feet of itself. Each boulder uses the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmGalebDuhr00000] stat block, except it has Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1 and lacks this action. The boulder takes its turn immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]] on the same Initiative count, and it obeys the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. A boulder remains animate for [[lookup @duration.value activity=lydBv987ChZ7itoS]] minute or until it or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies.

mmAntennae000000.name: Antennae
mmAntennae000000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]] object—armor or a weapon—worn or carried by a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]] feet of itself.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]], the creature with the object.

Failure: The object takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers (armor) or to its attack rolls (weapon). Armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10, and a weapon is destroyed if its penalty reaches -5. The penalty can be removed by casting the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMending000] spell on the armor or weapon.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides a Damaged Enchantment effect that will modify the targeted object. Due to the fact that the equipment penalty can be applied multiple times, the enchantment needs to be dragged from this item's Effects tab onto the target Item's sheet.

mmAquaticBurst00.name: Aquatic Burst
mmAquaticBurst00.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone] condition.

mmAquaticCharge0.name: Aquatic Charge
mmAquaticCharge0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] swims up to its Swim Speed straight toward an enemy it can see.

mmArcaneProwl000.name: Arcane Prowl
mmArcaneProwl000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can teleport up to [[lookup @range.value activity=a3RqyzU0UqzLJif0]] feet to an unoccupied space it can see, and it makes one [[/item Claw]] attack.

mmArcaneTentacle.name: Arcane Tentacles
mmArcaneTentacle.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can teleport the target up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see on a surface or liquid large enough to support the target. If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] kills it and magically devours its brain.

mmAstralImplosio.name: Astral Implosion
mmAstralImplosio.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it implodes and ejects any creatures and objects engulfed by it into the Astral Sea. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] itself vanishes, leaving behind a layer of slime on everything that was within 600 feet of it. In [[/r 1d20#Years]] years, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reconstitutes on a random world in the Material Plane.

mmAttach00000000.name: Attach
mmAttach00000000.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attaches to it. While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is attached, the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t make Attach attacks against other targets. In addition, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] halves the damage it takes (round down), and the target takes the same amount of damage.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can detach itself by spending 5 feet of movement. The target or a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=6iLqAufAeEqDOlGs]] feet of it can take an action to try to detach the [[lookup @name lowercase]], doing so by succeeding on a DC [[lookup @check.dc.value activity=6iLqAufAeEqDOlGs]] Strength (Athletics) check.

mmAuraOfAuthorit.name: Aura of Authority
mmAuraOfAuthorit.description: While in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dE4lg9tZyXtoCb5x]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its allies have Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws, provided the [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t have the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

mmAuraOfBravery0.name: Aura of Bravery
mmAuraOfBravery0.description: Creatures of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=N8uK4xdPCXdknRTb]]-foot Emanation originating from it have Immunity to the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] and &Reference[Frightened apply=false] conditions while there.

mmAvalancheSlam0.name: Avalanche Slam
mmAvalancheSlam0.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=M8ntOH8iSnEUaYhj]] creature and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=M8ntOH8iSnEUaYhj]] straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) Bludgeoning damage and has the &Reference[Prone] condition.

mmAversionToFire.name: Aversion to Fire
mmAversionToFire.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Fire damage, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

mmAvoidance00000.name: Avoidance
mmAvoidance00000.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the save and half damage if it fails. It can’t use this trait if it has the Incapacitated condition.

mmBalefulCommand.name: Baleful Command
mmBalefulCommand.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] and &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] conditions until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmBanish00000000.name: Banish
mmBanish00000000.description:
Charisma Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and is transported to a harmless demiplane until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn, at which point it re­appears in an unoccupied space of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s choice within [[lookup @range.value activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again [[lookup @duration.special activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]].

mmBanishingClaw0.name: Banishing Claw
mmBanishingClaw0.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect.

Charisma Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zTrsaQFwVagWU19h]].

Failure: The target is trapped in a demiplane inside the Soul Tome. While trapped there, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the [[/save ability=cha]] save, escaping the tome on a success. When the target escapes, it appears in the space it left or, if that space is occupied, the nearest unoccupied space.

If the target fails three of these saves while in the demiplane, it becomes bound to the tome and can escape only if the tome is reduced to 0 Hit Points.

mmBarbedHide0000.name: Barbed Hide
mmBarbedHide0000.description: At the start of each of its turns, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals [[/damage average]] damage to any creature [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=1O5eyc72vPW0UxYZ]].

mmBeaks000000000.name: Beaks
mmBeaks000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], or [[/damage average activity=3m1SLqBeMGQF3UaQ]] if [[lookup @activation.condition activity=3m1SLqBeMGQF3UaQ]]

mmBeard000000000.name: Beard
mmBeard000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. Until this poison ends, the target can’t regain Hit Points.

mmBeastOfBurden0.name: Beast of Burden

If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attacks an object. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] goes berserk, it remains so until it is destroyed or it is no longer Bloodied.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s creator, if within [[lookup @range.value activity=tnkOsrSwEElO2kZM]] feet of the berserk [[lookup @name lowercase]], can try to calm it by taking an action to make a [[/check ability=cha skill=per dc=@abilities.str.dc]] DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check; the golem must be able to hear its creator. If this check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk until the start of its next turn, at which point it resumes rolling for the Berserk trait again if it is still Bloodied.

mmCataclysmicEve.name: Cataclysmic Event
mmCataclysmicEve.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] creates one of the following effects at random (roll [[/r 1d4#Cataclysmic Event]]):

1: Clinging Flames.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=tUJIM74oC6JUcDJC]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=tUJIM74oC6JUcDJC]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=tUJIM74oC6JUcDJC]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average activity=tUJIM74oC6JUcDJC]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: The target starts &Reference[burning].

2: Freezing Waves.

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=rF7ttNDNWDfvxxkl]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=rF7ttNDNWDfvxxkl]]-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average activity=rF7ttNDNWDfvxxkl]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Success: Half damage only.

Failure or Success: The target’s Speed is reduced to 0 until the end of its next turn.

3: Raging Storm. A storm cloud fills a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=RNZgZ52YOGGAg1zj]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=RNZgZ52YOGGAg1zj]] feet. The cloud lasts for 1 minute or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Cataclysmic Event again. Creatures entirely in the cloud have the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Deafened apply=false] conditions and can’t cast spells with a Verbal component.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=RNZgZ52YOGGAg1zj]], each creature that enters the cloud for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there.

Failure: [[/damage average activity=RNZgZ52YOGGAg1zj]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

4: Swallowing Earth.

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=sJ4avTypqPGWDLlD]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=sJ4avTypqPGWDLlD]]-foot Cube originating from a point on the ground within [[lookup @range.value activity=sJ4avTypqPGWDLlD]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average activity=sJ4avTypqPGWDLlD]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition and is buried under rubble. A buried target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition, has &Reference[Total Cover], and is &Reference[suffocating]. As an action, a buried creature or another creature within 5 feet of it can make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@skills.ath.passive format=long]]. On a successful check, the creature is no longer buried.

Success: Half damage only.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical metal or wood in 1 round.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Attack Penalty active effect that will modify a targeted weapon. Since this penalty can be applied multiple times to multiple nonmagical weapons, this active effect needs to be dragged from this item's Effect tab onto the target Item's weapons.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] must finish a Long Rest before using this trait to cast that spell again.

mmCracklingWave0.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=ZtSx3SmaUHh2Ws7L]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=ZtSx3SmaUHh2Ws7L]]-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: The target is cursed until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. The target can’t take Reactions until the curse ends.

mmCreateSpecter0.name: Create Specter
mmCreateSpecter0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets a Humanoid corpse within [[lookup @range.value activity=ypIQdXr13u7LATUP]] feet of itself that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute. The target’s spirit rises as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmSpecter0000000]{Specter} in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. The specter is under the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s control. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have no more than seven specters under its control at a time.

mmCreateWhirlwin.name: Create Whirlwind
mmCreateWhirlwin.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] conjures a whirlwind at a point it can see within 120 feet. The whirlwind fills a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]]-foot-radius, [[lookup @target.template.height activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]]-foot-high [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]] centered on that point. The whirlwind lasts until the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Concentration on it ends. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move the whirlwind up to 20 feet at the start of each of its turns.

Whenever the whirlwind enters a creature’s space or a creature enters the whirlwind, that creature is subjected to the following effect.

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]] (a creature makes this save only once per turn, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is unaffected).

Failure: While in the whirlwind, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and moves with the whirlwind. At the start of each of its turns, the Restrained target takes [[/damage average]] damage. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.

mmCrush000000000.name: Crush
mmCrush000000000.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attaches to the target. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] had Advantage on the attack roll, it covers the target, which has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition and is &Reference[suffocating apply=false]{suffocating} while the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is attached in this way.

While attached to a target, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can attack only the target but has Advantage on its attack rolls. Its Speed becomes 0, it can’t benefit from any bonus to its Speed, and it moves with the target.

A creature can take an action to try to detach the [[lookup @name lowercase]] from itself, doing so with a successful [[/check format=long]]. On its turn, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can detach itself by using 5 feet of movement.

mmCunningAction0.name: Cunning Action
mmCunningAction0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Dash apply=false], the &Reference[Disengage apply=false], or &Reference[Hide apply=false] action.

mmCurseOfTheRidd.name: Curse of the Riddle
mmCurseOfTheRidd.description:
Intelligence Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=RbCvwBYpqZFD3jac]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=RbCvwBYpqZFD3jac]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=RbCvwBYpqZFD3jac]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is cursed with a riddle. The cursed target has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls. In addition, if it takes the Magic action, it must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or that action is wasted.

The cursed target can take a &Reference[Study] action to make a [[/check dc=15 ability=int format=long]], solving the riddle and ending the curse on a success. The curse ends early if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] curses another target.

mmCursedTouch000.name: Cursed Touch
mmCursedTouch000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is cursed. While cursed, the target gains no benefit from finishing a Short or Long Rest.

mmDeadlyAim00000.name: Deadly Aim
mmDeadlyAim00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] gives itself Advantage on the next attack roll it makes during the current turn. If that attack hits, the target takes an extra [[/damage average]] damage.

mmDeadlyLeap0000.name: Deadly Leap
mmDeadlyLeap0000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] spends 5 feet of movement to jump to a space within 15 feet that contains one or more Large or smaller creatures.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=IPCXEQoTuaAG5l52]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=IPCXEQoTuaAG5l52]] in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s destination space.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Success: Half damage, and the target is pushed 5 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

mmDeathBurst0000.name: Death Burst
mmDeathBurst0000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] explodes [[lookup @activation.condition activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]].

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=1SfqWSp7RSyHgG4b]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmDeathGlare0000.name: Death Glare
mmDeathGlare0000.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=3uA75vqvubgY300I]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=3uA75vqvubgY300I]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=3uA75vqvubgY300I]] feet.

Failure: If the target has 20 Hit Points or fewer, it drops to 0 Hit Points. Otherwise, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage.

mmDeathThroes000.name: Death Throes
mmDeathThroes000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] explodes when it dies.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=jTq2czA8KQITUK4c]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=jTq2czA8KQITUK4c]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Failure or Success: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside the Abyss, it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

mmDeathlessAgili.name: Deathless Agility
mmDeathlessAgili.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Dash] or &Reference[Disengage] action.

mmDecay000000000.name: Decay
mmDecay000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals [[/damage average]] damage [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=Seq1WbVdQNorBsTL]]. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmDefensiveStanc.name: Defensive Stance
mmDefensiveStanc.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 4 to its AC against melee attack rolls (including the triggering attack) until the start of its next turn, possibly causing the attacks to miss.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides an Active Effect (AE) that will modify this creature's Armor Class when you utilize the reaction. You can enable the AE in the effects tab of the character sheet.

mmDeflectMissile.name: Deflect Missile
mmDeflectMissile.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is [[lookup @activation.condition activity=9T8cNbSBVACrrmRI]].

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] reduces the damage it takes from the attack by [[/healing average]], and if that damage is reduced to 0, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can redirect some of the attack’s force.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=x0MjUmnv2OPAbm6y]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=x0MjUmnv2OPAbm6y]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=x0MjUmnv2OPAbm6y]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

mmDemonicRestora.name: Demonic Restoration
mmDemonicRestora.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

mmDestroyMetal00.name: Destroy Metal
mmDestroyMetal00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @range.special activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]] feet of itself [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]]. The touch destroys a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]] [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]] of the [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=GDJtelEYYTgc9jwr]].

mmDetectIntellig.name: Detect Intelligence
mmDetectIntellig.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] magically senses the location of any creature within 300 feet of itself that has an Intelligence score of 3 or higher, regardless of interposing barriers.

mmDevourIntellec.name: Devour Intellect
mmDevourIntellec.description:
Intelligence Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=7LNepwMsw4xbXyRk]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=7LNepwMsw4xbXyRk]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=7LNepwMsw4xbXyRk]] feet.

mmDiabolicalRest.name: Diabolical Restoration
mmDiabolicalRest.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside the Nine Hells, its body disappears in sulfurous smoke, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Nine Hells.

mmDisintegration.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, it disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

mmDisplacement00.name: Displacement
mmDisplacement00.description: Attack rolls against the [[lookup @name lowercase]] have Disadvantage, since it projects an illusion that makes it appear to be near its actual location. This trait is suppressed while the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the Incapacitated condition.

mmDissolvingPseu.name: Dissolving Pseudopod
mmDissolvingPseu.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. Nonmagical armor worn by the target takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10. The penalty can be removed by casting the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMending000]{Mending} spell on the armor.

mmDivineAid00000.name: Divine Aid
mmDivineAid00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHealingWor]{Healing Word}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbSanctuary0000]{Sanctuary}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmDivineAwarenes.name: Divine Awareness
mmDivineAwarenes.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows if it hears a lie.

mmDivineBeam0000.name: Divine Beam
mmDivineBeam0000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=MM0CWfZkvWYQQt2f]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=MM0CWfZkvWYQQt2f]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=MM0CWfZkvWYQQt2f]]-foot long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=MM0CWfZkvWYQQt2f]]-foot-wide line.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=MM0CWfZkvWYQQt2f]] damage.

Failure or Success: A creature reduced to 0 Hit Points by this beam disintegrates into dust, leaving behind any magic items it was wearing or carrying.

mmDivineRay00000.name: Divine Ray
mmDivineRay00000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]] ([[lookup @name lowercase]]’s choice).

mmDraconicOrigin.name: Draconic Origin
mmDraconicOrigin.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is related to a type of dragon associated with one of the following damage types (DM’s choice): Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison. This choice affects other aspects of the stat block.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect to manage Damage Resistances in the character sheet's Effects tab. The resistances outlined will need to be manually enabled/disabled.

mmDraconicStrike.name: Draconic Strike
mmDraconicStrike.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmDragonsBreath0.name: Dragon’s Breath
mmDragonsBreath0.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YfxQb5tcONgLb2nD]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=YfxQb5tcONgLb2nD]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=YfxQb5tcONgLb2nD]]-foot Cone.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=kFyuof0SS3nohP0f]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=kFyuof0SS3nohP0f]] Charmed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=kFyuof0SS3nohP0f]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: The target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken.

mmDrainingSwipe0.name: Draining Swipe
mmDrainingSwipe0.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target’s Strength score decreases by [[/r 1d4]]. The target dies if this reduces that score to 0. If a Humanoid is slain by this attack, a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmShadow00000000]{Shadow} rises from the corpse [[/r 1d4]] hours later.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides an Active Effect (AE) to modify the target's Strength Score. When the target roll's their d4 to determine the loss, you can apply the respective AE to the target's sheet.

mmDreadScythe000.name: Dread Scythe
mmDreadScythe000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target can’t regain Hit Points until the end of its next turn.

mmDreadfulGlare0.name: Dreadful Glare
mmDreadfulGlare0.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=8LmlZfevSQkOxGSN]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmDreadfulHowl00.name: Dreadful Howl
mmDreadfulHowl00.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=xToMbcg9i9oSf06f]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=xToMbcg9i9oSf06f]] within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=xToMbcg9i9oSf06f]] feet [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=xToMbcg9i9oSf06f]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

mmDrone000000000.name: Drone
mmDrone000000000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zHx1Cn6jyRMmYxir]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=zHx1Cn6jyRMmYxir]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zHx1Cn6jyRMmYxir]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (demons automatically succeed on this save).

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns. The target succeeds automatically after 10 minutes or if it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to empty a flask of Holy Water on it.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Drone for 24 hours.

mmDrop0000000000.name: Drop
mmDrop0000000000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] falls.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=yaKOcl4gDETLWHTE]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=yaKOcl4gDETLWHTE]] directly underneath the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] reduces any damage it takes from the fall by 20.

mmEarthGlide0000.name: Earth Glide
mmEarthGlide0000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn’t disturb the material it moves through.

mmEarthenMaul000.name: Earthen Maul
mmEarthenMaul000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmEldritchLanter.name: Eldritch Lantern
mmEldritchLanter.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFaerieFire]{Faerie Fire}, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.int.dc]]).

mmEldritchRestor.name: Eldritch Restoration
mmEldritchRestor.description: If destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains a new body in [[/r 5d10]] days, reviving with all its Hit Points in the Far Realm or another location chosen by the DM.

mmElementalAbsor.name: Elemental Absorption
mmElementalAbsor.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=5HvUimjPYvPVM4g7]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] gives itself Resistance to that instance of damage and gains [[/healing temp]].

Foundry Note

This feature also provides an Active Effect (AE) that will modify this creature's damage resistances. You can enable the damage resistance of your choice in the character sheet's effects tab.

mmElementalBurst.name: Elemental Burst
mmElementalBurst.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]] ([[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice).

mmElementalClaw0.name: Elemental Claw
mmElementalClaw0.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]] ([[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice). If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the cultist moves the target up to 10 feet straight toward or away from itself.

mmElementalResto.name: Elemental Restoration
mmElementalResto.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @item.requirements]], its body dissolves into brine, and it gains a new body in [[/r 1d4#Days]] days, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere on the Plane of Water.

mmEnchantingBow0.name: Enchanting Bow
mmEnchantingBow0.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmEngulf00000000.name: Engulf
mmEngulf00000000.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=5o0Bh8PQaojx5XMx]], one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=5o0Bh8PQaojx5XMx]] within 5 feet.

Failure: The target is pulled into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space and has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, and it takes [[/damage average activity=Exfa4q7O4SvXjGt7]] damage at the start of each of its turns. When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the Grappled target moves with it, costing it no extra movement. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one creature Grappled by this action at a time.

mmEntanglingPlan.name: Entangling Plants
mmEntanglingPlan.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplEntangle00] spell, using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.con.dc]]).

mmEntanglingRope.name: Entangling Rope
mmEntanglingRope.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=n8nEah4vbrEPphNF]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=n8nEah4vbrEPphNF]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the rope is destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses a Bonus Action to release the target, or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Entangling Rope again.

mmEntanglingTrai.name: Entangling Trail
mmEntanglingTrai.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]. Each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=fKlN5QustrK7LaSG]] within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=fKlN5QustrK7LaSG]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] as it moves is targeted once by the following effect.

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=fKlN5QustrK7LaSG]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

mmEnthrallingPan.name: Enthralling Panache
mmEnthrallingPan.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=66IPjaLIJqqwvmrL]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=66IPjaLIJqqwvmrL]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=66IPjaLIJqqwvmrL]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmEphemeral00000.name: Ephemeral
mmEphemeral00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t wear or carry anything.

mmEtherealJaunt0.name: Ethereal Jaunt
mmEtherealJaunt0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane or vice versa.

mmEtherealSight0.name: Ethereal Sight
mmEtherealSight0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane.

mmEtherealStride.name: Ethereal Stride
mmEtherealStride.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] and up to [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=0EfvhIXAIPlYUiNE]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=0EfvhIXAIPlYUiNE]] [[lookup @range.units activity=0EfvhIXAIPlYUiNE]]. of it teleport to the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane or vice versa.

mmEuphoriaBreath.name: Euphoria Breath
mmEuphoriaBreath.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Q6P0Nz8WgIKLlnNT]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Q6P0Nz8WgIKLlnNT]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Q6P0Nz8WgIKLlnNT]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns and uses all its movement on its turn to move in a random direction.

mmEvasion0000000.name: Evasion
mmEvasion0000000.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the save and only half damage if it fails. It can’t use this trait if it has the Incapacitated condition.

mmExaltedRestora.name: Exalted Restoration
mmExaltedRestora.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies outside Mount Celestia, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Mount Celestia.

mmExtractBrain00.name: Extract Brain
mmExtractBrain00.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=DinjHW2u6r40l57Y]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=DinjHW2u6r40l57Y]] that is Grappled by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Tentacles.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=DinjHW2u6r40l57Y]] damage.

Failure or Success: If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] kills it and devours its brain.

mmEyeRays0000000.name: Eye Rays
mmEyeRays0000000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] randomly shoots one of the following magical rays at a target it can see within 120 feet of itself (roll [[/r 1d4]]; reroll if the beholder has already used that ray during this turn):

Eye Rays

1: Confusion Ray.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=tXwLl6S6OFtqJeTm]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=tXwLl6S6OFtqJeTm]] damage, and the target can’t take Reactions until the end of its next turn. On its next turn, the target can’t move, and it uses its action to make a melee or ranged attack against a randomly determined creature within range. If the target can’t attack, it does nothing on that turn.

2: Paralyzing Ray.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=EZ5rsyCFKBY3TWww]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=EZ5rsyCFKBY3TWww]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=EZ5rsyCFKBY3TWww]], it succeeds automatically.

3: Fear Ray.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=aMfevxGsYy5swVDA]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=aMfevxGsYy5swVDA]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

4: Wounding Ray.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12.

Failure: 16 (3d10) Necrotic damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmFaerieDust0000.name: Faerie Dust
mmFaerieDust0000.description: Melee or Ranged Attack: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] [[lookup @item.range.units]]. or range [[lookup @item.range.value]] [[lookup @item.range.units]]. Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s aura for 24 hours.

While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and uses all its movement to dance in place. The effect ends on the target if it takes any damage.

Frightening. [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=ib78HezKRQ8jxfKz]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=ib78HezKRQ8jxfKz]]. If the target ends its turn out of line of sight from the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the condition ends on it.
