Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Hypnotic Gaze for 24 hours.

mmIceSpear000000.name: Ice Spear
mmIceSpear000000.description:
[[/attack extended]].

Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. Until the end of its next turn, the target can’t take a &Reference[Bonus Action] or &Reference[Reaction], its Speed decreases by 10 feet, and it can move or take one action on its turn, not both.

Hit or Miss: The spear magically returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

mmIceWalk0000000.name: Ice Walk
mmIceWalk0000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, &Reference[Difficult Terrain] composed of ice or snow doesn’t cost it extra movement.

mmIceWall0000000.name: Ice Wall
mmIceWall0000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWallofIce0]{Wall of Ice} (level 8 version), requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.int.dc]]).

mmIcyBite0000000.name: Icy Bite
mmIcyBite0000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target’s Speed decreases by 5 feet until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmIgnitedIllumin.name: Ignited Illumination
mmIgnitedIllumin.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sets itself ablaze or extinguishes its flames. While ablaze, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet.

mmIllumination00.name: Illumination
mmIllumination00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a 20-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 20 feet.

mmIllusoryAppear.name: Illusory Appearance
mmIllusoryAppear.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self}, using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]). The spell’s duration is [[lookup @duration.value activity=qY8e7Xm7QYQDXqsd]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=qY8e7Xm7QYQDXqsd]]s.

mmInciteRampage0.name: Incite Rampage
mmInciteRampage0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets another [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=KFhSwaFqmCUTBUTF]] it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=KFhSwaFqmCUTBUTF]] feet of itself [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=KFhSwaFqmCUTBUTF]]. The target can take a &Reference[Reaction] to make one melee attack.

mmIncorporealMov.name: Incorporeal Movement
mmIncorporealMov.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &Reference[Difficult Terrain]. It takes [[/damage 1d10 average type=force]] damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

mmIncubusForm000.name: Incubus Form
mmIncubusForm000.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] finishes a Long Rest, it can shape-shift into an @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmIncubus0000000]{Incubus}, using that stat block instead of this one.

mmInfernalGlaive.name: Infernal Glaive
mmInfernalGlaive.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature and doesn’t already have an infernal wound, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=4qy3fKL086OAE1xR]].

Failure: The target receives an infernal wound. While wounded, the target loses [[/damage average activity=IS4utGV80LpDrjvt]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. The wound closes after 1 minute, after a spell restores Hit Points to the target, or after the target or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to stanch the wound, doing so by succeeding on a [[/check format=long activity=KNWa0TFhANjmQCds]].

mmInfernalSting0.name: Infernal Sting
mmInfernalSting0.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. While Poisoned, the target can’t regain Hit Points.

mmInfernalTail00.name: Infernal Tail
mmInfernalTail00.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] [[lookup @range.units activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] damage, and the target receives an infernal wound if it doesn’t have one. While wounded, the target loses [[/damage average activity=zZfCQ0IeJZCjPLzE]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. The wound closes after [[lookup @duration.value activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]], after a spell restores Hit Points to the target, or after the target or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to stanch the wound, doing so by succeeding on a [[/check dc=17 ability=wis skill=med format=long]].

mmInfernoBlast00.name: Inferno Blast
mmInfernoBlast00.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]]-radius [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]] centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]] [[lookup @range.units activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=ta7GjruJh1oJ4cz3]] damage, and the target starts burning, taking [[/damage average activity=cuIDOQ2o3dMRhqzd]] damage at the start of each of its turns instead of the normal burning damage. The target gains 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level whenever it takes this burning damage.

Success: Half damage only.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect that will modify the targeted object. Due to the fact that effect can be applied multiple times, the effect needs to be dragged from this item's Effect tab onto the target item's sheet each time the target gains a level of exhaustion after the initial level is applied.

mmInjectingClaw0.name: Injecting Claw
mmInjectingClaw0.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Humanoid not cursed by a [[lookup @name lowercase]], it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=C5wp4BSKfYlbMurm]].

Failure: The target is cursed unawares, and a minuscule slaad egg is implanted in it. Removing the curse destroys the egg.

Over [[/r 2d4*10#Days egg gestates]]{2d4 × 10} days, the egg gestates. In the final 24 hours, the cursed target feels unwell; its Speed is halved, and it has Disadvantage on D20 Tests. At the end of this time, the egg turns into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmSlaadTadpole00]{Slaad Tadpole}, which chews out of the host and kills it.

mmInkCloud000000.name: Ink Cloud
mmInkCloud000000.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage while underwater.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] releases ink that fills a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=1MiIPcVuCpfgBIkS]]-foot Cube centered on itself, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Swim Speed. The Cube is Heavily Obscured for 1 minute or until a strong current or similar effect disperses the ink.

mmInscrutable000.name: Inscrutable
mmInscrutable000.description: No magic can observe the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remotely or detect its thoughts without its permission. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain its intentions or sincerity are made with Disadvantage.

mmInvisibility00.name: Invisibility
mmInvisibility00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

mmInvisibleInWat.name: Invisible in Water
mmInvisibleInWat.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the &Reference[Invisible] condition while fully immersed in water.

mmInvitation0000.name: Invitation
mmInvitation0000.description:
Charisma Saving Throw: DC 17, each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=dmDueJBxvNHlrRhx]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dmDueJBxvNHlrRhx]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target is teleported inside the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s space and swallowed. A swallowed [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=dmDueJBxvNHlrRhx]] has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Hit Points, a swallowed [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=dmDueJBxvNHlrRhx]] can leave the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s space only by using magic that enables planar travel, such as the Plane Shift spell.

mmIronScent00000.name: Iron Scent
mmIronScent00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pinpoint the location of [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=I1ppxiVO5CS6tKj0]] within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=I1ppxiVO5CS6tKj0]] feet of itself.

mmJinx0000000000.name: Jinx
mmJinx0000000000.description:
Trigger: A creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see hits it with an attack roll.

Response—Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=02KFzL9fElzyHOIT]], the triggering creature.

Failure: The attack misses instead.

mmJumper00000000.name: Jumper
mmJumper00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s jump distance is determined using its Dexterity rather than its Strength.

mmLeap0000000000.name: Leap
mmLeap0000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] jumps up to [[lookup @range.value activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]] feet by [[lookup @activation.condition activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]].

mmLegendaryResis.name: Legendary Resistance
mmLegendaryResis.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

mmLifeDrain00000.name: Life Drain
mmLifeDrain00000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, its Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken.

mmLifedrainingRo.name: Life-Draining Root
mmLifedrainingRo.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=3wTX71UEAiIZ5cr4]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=3wTX71UEAiIZ5cr4]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=3wTX71UEAiIZ5cr4]] [[lookup @range.units activity=3wTX71UEAiIZ5cr4]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=3wTX71UEAiIZ5cr4]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of six roots. Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and takes [[/damage average activity=y8c5uBc58T7dKgQf]] damage at the start of each of its turns. The target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

mmLightSensitivi.name: Light Sensitivity
mmLightSensitivi.description: While in Bright Light, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on attack rolls.

mmLightningAbsor.name: Lightning Absorption
mmLightningAbsor.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to Lightning damage, it regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Lightning damage dealt.

mmLightningBlade.name: Lightning Blade
mmLightningBlade.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target can’t take &Reference[Reaction] until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmLightningBreat.name: Lightning Breath
mmLightningBreat.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]]-foot-long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]]-foot-wide [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmLightningStorm.name: Lightning Storm
mmLightningStorm.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YVri6iuieFUUiO1d]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=YVri6iuieFUUiO1d]]-foot-radius, [[lookup @target.template.height activity=YVri6iuieFUUiO1d]]-feet-high Cylinder originating from a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=YVri6iuieFUUiO1d]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmLightningStrik.name: Lightning Strike
mmLightningStrik.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=v39JwGqgfaKiA4vc]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=v39JwGqgfaKiA4vc]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=v39JwGqgfaKiA4vc]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmLimitedAmphibi.name: Limited Amphibiousness
mmLimitedAmphibi.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water, but it must be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating outside water.

mmLimitedForesig.name: Limited Foresight
mmLimitedForesig.description:
Trigger: A creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see makes an attack roll against it.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] imposes Disadvantage on the roll, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains Advantage on attack rolls against the target until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmLivingShadow00.name: Living Shadow
mmLivingShadow00.description:
While in Dim Light or Darkness, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Resistance to damage that isn’t Force, Psychic, or Radiant.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect to manage Damage Resistances in the character sheet's Effects tab.

mmLoathsomeLimbs.name: Loathsome Limbs
mmLoathsomeLimbs.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] ends any turn Bloodied and took 15+ Slashing damage during that turn, one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]l’s limbs is severed, falls into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s space, and becomes a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmTrollLimb00000]{Troll Limb}. The limb acts immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level for each missing limb, and it grows replacement limbs the next time it regains Hit Points.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect condition in the character sheet's Effects tab to enable each level of Exhaustion. Since the condition can be applied multiple times, the GM must manually manage the level of Exhaustion. There is an active effect available for each level of exhaustion.

mmLordlyPresence.name: Lordly Presence
mmLordlyPresence.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=IlmzjggKrDB1c9dr]], any [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=IlmzjggKrDB1c9dr]] that starts its turn in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=IlmzjggKrDB1c9dr]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target suffers one of the following effects:

Captivated (Forager Only). The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

Fearful (Hunter Only). The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Mired (Sage Only). The target takes [[/damage average activity=hYhryWdKIuHOzmO3]] damage, and the target is magically bewildered until the end of its next turn. While bewildered, the target subtracts [[/r 1d4]] from its saving throws.

mmLuringSong0000.name: Luring Song
mmLuringSong0000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sings a magical melody, which lasts until the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Concentration ends on it.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]], each [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] when the song starts.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the song ends and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns. While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and ignores the Luring Song of other harpies.

If the target is more than 5 feet from the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the target moves on its turn toward the [[lookup @name lowercase]] by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. It doesn’t avoid &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]; however, before moving into damaging terrain (such as lava or a pit) and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the target repeats the save.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Luring Song for 24 hours.

mmMagicOfTheSpid.name: Magic of the Spider Queen
mmMagicOfTheSpid.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDarkness00]{Darkness}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFaerieFire]{Faerie Fire}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWeb0000000]{Web}, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]).

mmMagicResistanc.name: Magic Resistance
mmMagicResistanc.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

mmMagicRope00000.name: Magic Rope
mmMagicRope00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a magic rope. While bearing it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use the [[/item .mmEntanglingRope]] action. The rope has AC 20, HP 90, and Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage. The rope turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points, if it is 5+ feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] for 1 hour or more, or if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies. If the rope is damaged or destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can fully restore it when finishing a Short or Long Rest.

mmMagicalBacklas.name: Magical Backlash
mmMagicalBacklas.description:
Trigger: A [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Xo0DP0xMs25LpqJ6]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=Xo0DP0xMs25LpqJ6]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals damage to it.

Response—Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Xo0DP0xMs25LpqJ6]], the triggering [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Xo0DP0xMs25LpqJ6]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

mmMajesticSong00.name: Majestic Song
mmMajesticSong00.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=6TeipSZlJHOJTSZQ]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=6TeipSZlJHOJTSZQ]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=6TeipSZlJHOJTSZQ]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within [[lookup @range.value activity=6TeipSZlJHOJTSZQ]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] or &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition ([[lookup @name lowercase]]’s choice) until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

mmMaliciousMagic.name: Malicious Magic
mmMaliciousMagic.description: Malicious Magic. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Spellcasting to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDimensionD]{Dimension Door} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHypnoticPa]{Hypnotic Pattern}. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmMercurialAxe00.name: Mercurial Axe
mmMercurialAxe00.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] ft. or range [[lookup @item.range.value]]/[[lookup @item.range.long]] ft. [[/damage average extended]]. Hit or Miss: The axe magically returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

mmMercurialTride.name: Mercurial Trident
mmMercurialTride.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. Hit or Miss: The trident magically returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s claw immediately after a ranged attack.

mmMercurialWhip0.name: Mercurial Whip
mmMercurialWhip0.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can teleport the target up to 10 feet to an unoccupied space the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see that isn’t in the air.

mmMimicry0000000.name: Mimicry
mmMimicry0000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a whisper or chitter. A hearer can discern the sounds are imitations with a successful [[/check format=long]].

mmMindBlast00000.name: Mind Blast
mmMindBlast00000.description:
Intelligence Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=lHIQgEzz6hc3hjWx]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=lHIQgEzz6hc3hjWx]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=lHIQgEzz6hc3hjWx]]-foot. [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=lHIQgEzz6hc3hjWx]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

mmMindBurst00000.name: Mind Burst
mmMindBurst00000.description:
Intelligence Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=T0ybbd1ZrLCdEXsW]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=T0ybbd1ZrLCdEXsW]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=T0ybbd1ZrLCdEXsW]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=T0ybbd1ZrLCdEXsW]]. Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=T0ybbd1ZrLCdEXsW]] damage only.

mmMindCorrosion0.name: Mind Corrosion
mmMindCorrosion0.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw against a spell or another magical effect created by a creature. Response: The triggering creature takes [[/damage average]] damage.

mmMindInvasion00.name: Mind Invasion
mmMindInvasion00.description: The dragon uses [[/item Spellcasting]] to cast [[/item .mmSpellcasting00.Activity.hHQiQYfo3AV5ZW6F]] (level 3 version).

mmMindJolt000000.name: Mind Jolt
mmMindJolt000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item Spellcasting]] to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMindSpike0]{Mind Spike} (level 5 version). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmMindRot0000000.name: Mind Rot
mmMindRot0000000.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=DvEIJK7HFwBWNpkq]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=DvEIJK7HFwBWNpkq]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=DvEIJK7HFwBWNpkq]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=DvEIJK7HFwBWNpkq]] damage only.

mmMindrendingRoa.name: Mind-Rending Roar
mmMindrendingRoa.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zPMfwwIoTFzIrN5H]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=zPMfwwIoTFzIrN5H]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zPMfwwIoTFzIrN5H]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmMistyEscape000.name: Misty Escape
mmMistyEscape000.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 0 Hit Points outside its resting place, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Shape-Shift to become mist (no action required). If it can’t use Shape-Shift, it is destroyed.

While it has 0 Hit Points in mist form, it can’t return to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it returns to its vampire form and has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until it regains any Hit Points, and it regains 1 Hit Point after spending 1 hour there.

mmMistyStep00000.name: Misty Step
mmMistyStep00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]{Misty Step}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmMistyVeil00000.name: Misty Veil
mmMistyVeil00000.description: The marid casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplFogCloud00]{Fog Cloud}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmMoan0000000000.name: Moan
mmMoan0000000000.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Mng39fcFDc4I1AzY]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Mng39fcFDc4I1AzY]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Mng39fcFDc4I1AzY]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=Mng39fcFDc4I1AzY]]. Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Moan for the next 24 hours.

mmMockery0000000.name: Mockery
mmMockery0000000.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=s5CMus4LOXBkt1Wn]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=s5CMus4LOXBkt1Wn]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=s5CMus4LOXBkt1Wn]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

mmMucusCloud0000.name: Mucus Cloud

While underwater, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is surrounded by mucus.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=clFFG8uDBSFzxIo8]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=clFFG8uDBSFzxIo8]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=clFFG8uDBSFzxIo8]] Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] at the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s turn.

Failure: The target is cursed. Until the curse ends, the target’s skin becomes slimy, the target can breathe air and water, and it can’t regain Hit Points unless it is underwater.

While the cursed creature is outside a body of water, the creature takes [[/damage average activity=JrxCVyCOsBAMVZS7]] damage at the end of every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to its skin before those minutes have passed.

mmMudBreath00000.name: Mud Breath
mmMudBreath00000.description:

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmMultiattack000.name: Multiattack
mmMultiattack000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes two [[/item .mmPoisonBurst000]]{Poison Burst} attacks, and it can use Spellcasting to cast [[/item .mmSpellcasting00.Activity.U5Fbd5lSNBO7B00g]] if available.

mmMultipleHeads0.name: Multiple Heads
mmMultipleHeads0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has five heads. Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 25 damage or more on a single turn, one of its heads dies. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies if all its heads are dead. At the end of each of its turns when it has at least one living head, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken Fire damage since its last turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 20 Hit Points when it grows new heads.

mmMutatingClaw00.name: Mutating Claw
mmMutatingClaw00.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Humanoid not cursed by a slaad, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zy66rXdo6Mo4E9bO]].

Failure: The target is cursed. The cursed target can’t regain Hit Points, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} after every 24 hours and doesn’t return to normal after finishing a Long Rest.

If the curse reduces the target’s Hit Point maximum to 0, the curse ends, and instead of dying, the target instantly transforms into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmRedSlaad000000]{Red Slaad} or, if it can cast spells of level 3 or higher, a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmGreenSlaad0000]{Green Slaad}. Only a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell can reverse this transformation.

mmNightmare00000.name: Nightmare
mmNightmare00000.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]] feet.

Failure: If the target has 20 Hit Points or fewer, it has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]], until it takes damage, or until a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it. Otherwise, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage.

mmNightmareHaunt.name: Nightmare Haunting
mmNightmareHaunt.description:
While on the Ethereal Plane, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDream00000]{Dream}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting. Only the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can serve as the spell’s messenger, and the target must be a [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=4GGGVhvLSrHgHdb9]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=4GGGVhvLSrHgHdb9]]. The spell fails and is wasted if the target is under the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbEvilAndGoodPr]{Protection from Evil and Good} spell or within a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicCircl]{Magic Circle} spell.

If the target takes damage from the Dream spell, the target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to that damage. If the spell kills the target, its soul is trapped in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s soul bag, and the target can’t be raised from the dead until its soul is released.

mmNightmareRay00.name: Nightmare Ray
mmNightmareRay00.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmNimbleEscape00.name: Nimble Escape

mmOnslaught00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one [[/item .mmClaw0000000000]] or [[/item .mmTail0000000000]] attack.

mmOozeCube000000.name: Ooze Cube
mmOozeCube000000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] fills its entire space and is transparent. Other creatures can enter that space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Engulf and has Disadvantage on the saving throw.

Creatures inside the [[lookup @name lowercase]] have &Reference[Total Cover], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can hold one Large creature or up to four Medium or Small creatures inside itself at a time.

As an action, a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=EcTOfXWsDJRHLydy]] [[lookup @range.units activity=EcTOfXWsDJRHLydy]]. of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pull a creature or an object out of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] by succeeding on a [[/check dc=12 ability=str skill=ath format=long]], and the puller takes [[/damage average activity=PMCvyqxfUYiPzNK8]] damage.

mmPackTactics000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition.

After [[lookup @duration.value activity=7A7cyFzvHi67yI5f]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=7A7cyFzvHi67yI5f]], it succeeds automatically.

mmParalyzingBrea.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=r4MGqEq5U9aaseBh]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=r4MGqEq5U9aaseBh]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=r4MGqEq5U9aaseBh]]-foot Cone.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

mmParalyzingTent.description:

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. While Poisoned, the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

mmParry000000000.name: Parry
mmParry000000000.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is [[lookup @activation.condition activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds [[lookup @prof]] to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

mmPetrifyingBite.description:

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Petrified apply=false] condition instead of the Restrained condition.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Petrified apply=false] condition instead of the Restrained condition.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Petrified apply=false] condition instead of the Restrained condition.

The spell ends early if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] starts or ends its turn in Bright Light.

Until the grapple ends, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t make Pincer Staff attacks.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] rolls [[/r 1d20]] and chooses whether to use that roll in place of the d20 rolled for the D20 Test.

mmProboscis00000.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attaches to the target. While attached, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t make Proboscis attacks, and the target takes [[/damage average activity=5xwoPMBiaRBqjFav]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns.

mmProneDeficienc.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] receives the Prone condition, roll a die. On an odd number, it has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition. At the end of each of its turns, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes a DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=LfYXT04YlFJUhscb]] Dexterity saving throw, ending the Incapacitated condition on a success.

Response: The wearer gains a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack and possibly causing it to miss, until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmProtectiveMagi.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplCounterspe]{Counterspell} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShield0000]{Shield} in response to the spell’s trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmRadiantStrike0.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @range.value activity=zJ3acnDA3C9uZ5BO]] [[lookup @range.units activity=zJ3acnDA3C9uZ5BO]]. [[/damage average extended]].

mmReflexiveAnten.description: Trigger: An attack roll hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item .mmAntennae000000]].

mmRepulsionBreat.name: Repulsion Breath
mmRepulsionBreat.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zuf9EEVj4nI1joaH]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=zuf9EEVj4nI1joaH]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zuf9EEVj4nI1joaH]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target is pushed up to 40 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmRestlessTouch0.name: Restless Touch
mmRestlessTouch0.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target is cursed for 24 hours or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies. Until the curse ends, the target gains no benefit from finishing Short Rests.

mmRestrainingGlo.name: Restraining Glob
mmRestrainingGlo.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] lobs a slimy glob at [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=P1YLDUEKG7baOYir]] it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=P1YLDUEKG7baOYir]] feet of itself.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=P1YLDUEKG7baOYir]], the targeted [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=P1YLDUEKG7baOYir]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. The glob rolls the target 60-feet straight toward the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn, when the glob harmlessly dissolves.

Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=P1YLDUEKG7baOYir]] damage only.

mmRiposte0000000.name: Riposte
mmRiposte0000000.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 3 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss. On a miss, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one Rapier attack against the triggering creature if within range.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides an Active Effect (AE) that will modify this creature's Armor Class when you utilize the reaction. You can enable the AE in the effects tab of the character sheet.

mmRoar0000000000.name: Roar
mmRoar0000000000.description:
The sphinx emits a magical roar. Whenever it roars, the roar has a different effect, as detailed below (the sequence resets when it takes a Long Rest):

First Roar.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]], each enemy in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]].

Second Roar.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]], it succeeds automatically.

Third Roar.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]] damage only.

mmRockLaunch0000.name: Rock Launch
mmRockLaunch0000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmRottingFist000.name: Rotting Fist
mmRottingFist000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is cursed. While cursed, the target can’t regain Hit Points, its Hit Point maximum doesn’t return to normal when finishing a Long Rest, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} every 24 hours that elapse. A creature dies and turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack.

mmRottingGaze000.name: Rotting Gaze
mmRottingGaze000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=k4jetEkSCPApNFgz]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=k4jetEkSCPApNFgz]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=k4jetEkSCPApNFgz]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmRumblingMoveme.name: Rumbling Movement
mmRumblingMoveme.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed, Fly Speed, or Swim Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks].

Each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=6LnRjVsoOrDcYSqw]] within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=6LnRjVsoOrDcYSqw]] [[lookup @target.template.units activity=6LnRjVsoOrDcYSqw]]. of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] as it moves is targeted once by the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=6LnRjVsoOrDcYSqw]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmRunningLeap000.name: Running Leap
mmRunningLeap000.description: With a 10-foot running start, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can Long Jump up to 25 feet.

mmSacredWeapon00.name: Sacred Weapon
mmSacredWeapon00.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn. The target can choose not to be Stunned, in which case it takes an extra [[/damage activity=EotF3wFKQQnsLEGX]] damage that bypasses Resistance or Immunity.

mmSanguineDrain0.name: Sanguine Drain
mmSanguineDrain0.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zw4GduIbxRyUVb1Y]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=zw4GduIbxRyUVb1Y]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=zw4GduIbxRyUVb1Y]] [[lookup @range.units activity=zw4GduIbxRyUVb1Y]]. [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=zw4GduIbxRyUVb1Y]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. The target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

mmScare000000000.name: Scare
mmScare000000000.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=L6pjs2RafI3pF8b3]], one creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=L6pjs2RafI3pF8b3]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

mmScorchingSands.name: Scorching Sands
mmScorchingSands.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=g5fxAWhrpwohtETl]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=g5fxAWhrpwohtETl]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=g5fxAWhrpwohtETl]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target’s Speed is halved until the end of its next turn.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmScreech0000000.name: Screech
mmScreech0000000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=mXGsh0QEm9aKiHKn]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=mXGsh0QEm9aKiHKn]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=mXGsh0QEm9aKiHKn]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

mmSenseMagic0000.name: Sense Magic
mmSenseMagic0000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] senses magic within 120 feet of itself. This trait otherwise works like the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic} spell but isn’t itself magical.

mmShadowBlade000.name: Shadow Blade
mmShadowBlade000.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] ft. or range [[lookup @item.range.value]] ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. Hit or Miss: The blade magically returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

mmShadowBreath00.name: Shadow Breath
mmShadowBreath00.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=hvGQg4CsoCNgrjGy]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=hvGQg4CsoCNgrjGy]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=hvGQg4CsoCNgrjGy]]. [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=hvGQg4CsoCNgrjGy]]

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: A Humanoid reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage dies, and a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmShadow00000000]{Shadow} rises from its corpse. The shadow is under the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s control and shares the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Initiative count but acts immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

mmShadowEscape00.name: Shadow Escape
mmShadowEscape00.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 0 Hit Points outside its resting place, it teleports into its resting place unless it is in running water or sunlight. If it can’t teleport, it is destroyed. Once inside its resting place, it has the &Reference[Paralyzed] condition for 1 hour, after which it regains 1 Hit Point.

mmShadowStealth0.name: Shadow Stealth
mmShadowStealth0.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Hide] action.

mmShadowyTelepor.name: Shadowy Teleport
mmShadowyTelepor.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the &Reference[Invisible apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=OkgNdhDVAMk4wyEa]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=OkgNdhDVAMk4wyEa]], and it teleports up to [[lookup @range.value activity=OkgNdhDVAMk4wyEa]] feet to an unoccupied space it can see. The condition ends early immediately after it deals damage.

mmShapeshift0000.name: Shape-Shift
mmShapeshift0000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shape-shifts into a Medium snake or returns to its true form. If it dies, it stays in its current form. The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s game statistics are the same in each form, except where noted. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.

mmSharkTelepathy.name: Shark Telepathy
mmSharkTelepathy.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can magically control sharks within 120 feet of itself, using a special telepathy.

mmSharpenedBeak0.name: Sharpened Beak
mmSharpenedBeak0.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=4uExdYHu8g4qxk5r]] [[lookup @range.units activity=4uExdYHu8g4qxk5r]]. of the target ([[lookup @name lowercase]]’s choice) takes [[/damage average activity=4uExdYHu8g4qxk5r]] damage.

mmShield00000000.name: Shield
mmShield00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShield0000]{Shield} in response to that spell’s trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmShieldBash0000.name: Shield Bash
mmShieldBash0000.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]] [[lookup @range.units activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]]. that the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmShieldedMind00.name: Shielded Mind
mmShieldedMind00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s thoughts can’t be read by any means, and other creatures can communicate with it telepathically only if it allows them.

mmShimmeringShie.name: Shimmering Shield
mmShimmeringShie.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets itself or one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=sl8NoPhB0e5z6jmK]] it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=sl8NoPhB0e5z6jmK]] feet of itself. The target gains [[/healing average temp]], and its AC increases by 2 until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s' next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmShockwaveOfGlo.name: Shockwave of Glory
mmShockwaveOfGlo.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=D9xmcR92PLqyk6bZ]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=D9xmcR92PLqyk6bZ]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=D9xmcR92PLqyk6bZ]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Success: Half damage only.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmShriek00000000.name: Shriek
mmShriek00000000.description: Trigger: A [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Tlv3gcYk5KfdtV7c]] or a source of Bright Light moves within [[lookup @range.value activity=Tlv3gcYk5KfdtV7c]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits a shriek audible within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Tlv3gcYk5KfdtV7c]] feet of itself for [[lookup @duration.value activity=Tlv3gcYk5KfdtV7c]] minute or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies.

mmSickeningRay00.name: Sickening Ray
mmSickeningRay00.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmSickeningVapor.name: Sickening Vapors
mmSickeningVapor.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=a9NAwfq8B1qvfEi7]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=a9NAwfq8B1qvfEi7]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] at the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s turn.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Sickening Vapors for 24 hours.

mmSiegeMonster00.name: Siege Monster
mmSiegeMonster00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals double damage to objects and structures.

mmSilverSword000.name: Silver Sword
mmSilverSword000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. Critical Hit: If the target is in an astral body (as with the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAstralProj]{Astral Projection} spell), the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body instead of dealing damage.

mmSlayingBow0000.name: Slaying Bow
mmSlayingBow0000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]] [[lookup @range.units activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]].

Failure: If the [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]] has 100 Hit Points or fewer, it dies. It otherwise takes [[/damage average]] damage.

mmSleep000000000.name: Sleep
mmSleep000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSleep00000] spell, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]).

mmSleepBreath000.name: Sleep Breath
mmSleepBreath000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=6ce9oevQRWomSVSF]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=6ce9oevQRWomSVSF]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=6ce9oevQRWomSVSF]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn, at which point it repeats the save.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=EZma0lCmQeTuVuAL]] minute. This effect ends for the target if it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

mmSleepGaze00000.name: Sleep Gaze
mmSleepGaze00000.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=TXstlDE42CZicPAk]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=TXstlDE42CZicPAk]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=TXstlDE42CZicPAk]] feet (Constructs and Undead succeed automatically).

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for [[lookup @labels.duration activity=TXstlDE42CZicPAk]] or until it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Sleep Gaze for 24 hours.

mmSlow0000000000.name: Slow
mmSlow0000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSlow000000]{Slow} spell, requiring no spell components and using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]).

mmSlowingBreath0.name: Slowing Breath
mmSlowingBreath0.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=teMMQNDDIE9XkPN3]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=teMMQNDDIE9XkPN3]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target can’t take Reactions; its Speed is halved; and it can take either an action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both. This effect lasts until the end of its next turn.

mmSmeltingCharge.name: Smelting Charge
mmSmeltingCharge.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks] and [[lookup @range.special activity=DnNDb8TtIrFe33aF]]

Each time the [[lookup @name lowercase]] enters a creature’s space for the first time during this move, that target is subjected to the following effect.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=DnNDb8TtIrFe33aF]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pulled into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s space and has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]); if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] already has a creature Grappled, the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition instead.

Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition. When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves, the Grappled target moves with it, costing no extra movement.

mmSmite000000000.name: Smite
mmSmite000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Divine Ray]] attack.

mmSmokeBomb00000.name: Smoke Bomb
mmSmokeBomb00000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] throws a bomb to a point it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=nk7wJnUtROO1cY4W]] feet of itself.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=nk7wJnUtROO1cY4W]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=nk7wJnUtROO1cY4W]]-foot-radius [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=nk7wJnUtROO1cY4W]] centered on that point.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

mmSmother0000000.name: Smother
mmSmother0000000.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can give it the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) instead of dealing damage. Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, is &Reference[Suffocating]{suffocating}, and takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of its turns. [[lookup @name lowercase]] rug can smother only one creature at a time.

While grappling the target, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] halves the damage it takes (round down), and the target takes the same amount of damage.

mmSonicBoom00000.name: Sonic Boom
mmSonicBoom00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Spellcasting to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplShatter000]{Shatter} (level 3 version). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmSoulBag0000000.name: Soul Bag
mmSoulBag0000000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a soul bag. While holding or carrying the bag, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use its Nightmare Haunting action.

The bag has AC 15, HP 20, and Resistance to all damage. The bag turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points. If the bag is destroyed, any souls the bag is holding are released. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can create a new bag after 7 days.

mmSoulTome000000.name: Soul Tome
mmSoulTome000000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a magic tome. While holding or carrying the tome, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use its [[/item .mmBanishingClaw0]] action.

The tome has AC 17; HP 35; and Immunity to Necrotic, Poison, and Psychic damage. The tome regains all its Hit Points at the end of every turn, but it turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points or when the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies. If the tome is destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can create a new one when it finishes a Short or Long Rest.

mmSpeakWithBeast.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
mmSpeakWithBeast.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can communicate with Beasts and Plants as if they shared a language.

mmSpeakWithFrogs.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
mmSpeakWithFrogs.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

mmSpectralClaw00.name: Spectral Claw
mmSpectralClaw00.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] ft. or range [[lookup @item.range.value]] ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmSpectralJaws00.name: Spectral Jaws
mmSpectralJaws00.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] ft. or range [[lookup @item.range.value]] ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

mmSpellImmunity0.name: Spell Immunity
mmSpellImmunity0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is immune to three spells chosen by its creator. Typical choices include @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplHeatMetal0]{Heat Metal}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplLightningB]{Lightning Bolt}, and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}.

mmSpellReflectio.name: Spell Reflection
mmSpellReflectio.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=ZYmB6aUHCqkMh0Ji]]

Response—Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=ZYmB6aUHCqkMh0Ji]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=ZYmB6aUHCqkMh0Ji]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=ZYmB6aUHCqkMh0Ji]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

mmSpellStoring00.name: Spell Storing
mmSpellStoring00.description: A spellcaster who wears the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s amulet can cause the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to store one spell of level 4 or lower. To do so, the wearer must cast the spell on the [[lookup @name lowercase]] while within 5 feet of it. The spell has no effect but is stored within the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Any previously stored spell is lost when a new spell is stored. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cast the spell stored with any parameters set by the original caster, requiring no spell components and using the caster’s spellcasting ability. The stored spell is then lost.

mmSpellcasting00.name: Spellcasting  (Yuan-ti Form Only)
mmSpellcasting00.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAnimalFrie]{Animal Friendship} (snakes only)

2/Day: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSuggestion]{Suggestion}

mmSpiderClimb000.name: Spider Climb
mmSpiderClimb000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

mmSpiritJar00000.name: Spirit Jar
mmSpiritJar00000.description: If destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reforms in [[/r 1d10]] days if it has a spirit jar, reviving with all its Hit Points. The new body appears in an unoccupied space within the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s lair.

mmSpiritWail0000.name: Spirit Wail
mmSpiritWail0000.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=5JzDfoXBTiCay7OP]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=5JzDfoXBTiCay7OP]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=5JzDfoXBTiCay7OP]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the creature has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

mmSpiritualWeapo.name: Spiritual Weapon
mmSpiritualWeapo.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSpiritualW]{Spiritual Weapon} spell, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmSpitefulEscape.name: Spiteful Escape
mmSpitefulEscape.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 0 Hit Points, it dies only if it is within 30 feet of its anathema (a thing the DM chooses as the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s most hated thing). Otherwise, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 1 Hit Point and teleports to a harmless demiplane, and it can’t return to the plane it left for [[/r 2d6]] days. When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports away, each creature within 60 feet of the space it left is cursed. Until the curse ends, a creature has Disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows its location anywhere in the multiverse.

mmSplit000000000.name: Split
mmSplit000000000.description:
Trigger: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=zoXFSgzmWq8frUjI]]

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] splits into two new [[lookup @name capitalize]]. Each new [[lookup @name lowercase]] is one size smaller than the original [[lookup @name lowercase]] and acts on its Initiative. The original [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Hit Points are divided evenly between the new [[lookup @name lowercase]]s (round down).

mmSporeBomb00000.name: Spore Bomb
mmSporeBomb00000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=cmFbJQhqZiLBF9Ij]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=cmFbJQhqZiLBF9Ij]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=cmFbJQhqZiLBF9Ij]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=cmFbJQhqZiLBF9Ij]] feet].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. While Poisoned, the target can’t regain Hit Points.

Success: Half damage only.

mmSpores00000000.name: Spores
mmSpores00000000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=voqQeTnihpy3BTFf]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=voqQeTnihpy3BTFf]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. While Poisoned, the target takes [[/damage average activity=ukZveNVmvvtwbDj0]] at the start of each of its turns. Emptying a flask of Holy Water on the target ends the effect early.

mmStandingLeap00.name: Standing Leap
mmStandingLeap00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s Long Jump is up to 20 feet and its High Jump is up to 10 feet with or without a running start.

mmStealBody00000.name: Steal Body
mmStealBody00000.description:
Intelligence Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dKA6FqhkPRD5rLhA]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=dKA6FqhkPRD5rLhA]]

Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] possesses the target, consumes its brain, and teleports inside its skull.

While there, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects originating outside its host. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] retains its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; its understanding of Deep Speech; its telepathy; and its Detect Intelligence trait. It otherwise adopts the target’s game statistics. It knows everything the target knew, including spells and languages.

If the host body dies, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must leave it. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is also forced out if the target regains its devoured brain by means of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell.

By spending 5 feet of its movement, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can voluntarily leave the body, teleporting to the nearest unoccupied space within 5 feet of it. The body then dies unless its brain is restored before the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmSteamBreath000.name: Steam Breath
mmSteamBreath000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=5iI1KQRWrdMGh9sy]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=5iI1KQRWrdMGh9sy]]-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target’s Speed decreases by 10 feet until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] next turn..

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: Being underwater doesn’t grant Resistance to this Fire damage.

mmStench00000000.name: Stench
mmStench00000000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=mJbwhj3beOIB3Jgj]], any creature (other than a [[lookup @name lowercase]]) that starts its turn in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=mJbwhj3beOIB3Jgj]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn.

Success: The target is immune to the Stench of all [[lookup @name lowercase]] for 1 hour.

mmStickyShield00.name: Sticky Shield
mmStickyShield00.description:
Trigger: A creature misses the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with a melee attack roll using a weapon. Response—Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=A8a55LxaAvNmIUnj]], the triggering creature.

Failure: The attack’s weapon sticks to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s shield. If the target doesn’t let go of the weapon, the target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition while the weapon is stuck (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). While stuck, the weapon can’t be used. The target can take an action to make a [[/check ath dc=@skills.ath.passive format=long]], freeing the weapon on a success.

mmSting000000000.name: Sting
mmSting000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the wyvern’s next turn.

mmStomp000000000.name: Stomp
mmStomp000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks], and it can make one [[/item Slam]] attack at any point during that move.

mmStrangeScepter.name: Strange Scepter
mmStrangeScepter.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] ft. or range [[lookup @item.range.value]] ft. [[/damage average extended]].

mmStunningScreec.name: Stunning Screech
mmStunningScreec.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=eoIikvnPayaj02oN]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=eoIikvnPayaj02oN]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (demons succeed automatically).

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmSuccubusForm00.name: Succubus Form
mmSuccubusForm00.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] finishes a Long Rest, it can shape-shift into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.actors.Actor.mmSuccubus000000]{Succubus}, using that stat block instead of this one. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.

mmSunRay00000000.name: Sun Ray
mmSunRay00000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmSunSickness000.name: Sun Sickness
mmSunSickness000.description: While in sunlight, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on D20 Tests. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies if it spends more than 1 hour in sunlight.

mmSunlightHypers.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
mmSunlightHypers.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes [[/damage]] damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

mmSunlightSensit.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
mmSunlightSensit.description: While in sunlight, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

mmSunlightWeakne.name: Sunlight Weakness
mmSunlightWeakne.description: While in sunlight, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on D20 Tests.

mmSuperiorInvisi.name: Superior Invisibility
mmSuperiorInvisi.description: The dragon casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGreaterInv]{Greater Invisibility} on itself, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmSurge000000000.name: Surge
mmSurge000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]), and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

mmSwallow0000000.name: Swallow
mmSwallow0000000.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (it can have up to six creatures swallowed at a time).

Failure: The target is swallowed, and the Grappled condition ends. A swallowed creature has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions and can’t teleport, it has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and takes [[/damage average activity=zrWNjO9mkbN28spL]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]] at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, each of which falls in a space within [[lookup @range.value activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, any swallowed creature no longer has the Restrained condition and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting Prone.

mmSwarm000000000.name: Swarm
mmSwarm000000000.description: The swarm can occupy another creature’s space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny snake. The swarm can’t regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.

mmSwarmOfGraspin.name: Swarm of Grasping Hands
mmSwarmOfGraspin.description: [[/attack extended activity=rO8NirkWF6w9GXTc]]. [[/damage average extended activity=rO8NirkWF6w9GXTc]], or [[/damage average activity=hzeHzcSKHC4AvIJQ]] damage if [[lookup @activation.condition activity=hzeHzcSKHC4AvIJQ]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmSwarmOfProbosc.name: Swarm of Proboscises
mmSwarmOfProbosc.description: [[/attack extended activity=RkmvpUI0spboBnYE]]. [[/damage average extended activity=RkmvpUI0spboBnYE]], or [[/damage average activity=Mgyp5Wa3cgoXX3N4]] damage if [[lookup @activation.condition activity=Mgyp5Wa3cgoXX3N4]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature in the swarm’s space, the target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.acr.passive]]). Until the grapple ends, the target takes [[/damage average activity=n1k1Xq0kdB79VrOI]] damage at the end of each of its turns.

mmSwoop000000000.name: Swoop
mmSwoop000000000.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a creature Grappled, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] flies up to half its Fly Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks] and drops that creature.

mmTacticalCharge.name: Tactical Charge
mmTacticalCharge.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed straight toward an enemy it can see without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks].

mmTail0000000000.name: Tail
mmTail0000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmTailSwipe00000.name: Tail Swipe
mmTailSwipe00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Rend]] attack.

mmTalons00000000.name: Talons
mmTalons00000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=xdrDC5kFs6sCOFiE]] creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from both talons, and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

mmTelekineticThr.name: Telekinetic Thrust
mmTelekineticThr.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=qHeMp7n2VPHtGbDS]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=qHeMp7n2VPHtGbDS]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=qHeMp7n2VPHtGbDS]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pushed up to [[lookup @range.value activity=qHeMp7n2VPHtGbDS]] [[lookup @range.units activity=qHeMp7n2VPHtGbDS]]. straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

mmTelepathicBond.name: Telepathic Bond
mmTelepathicBond.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is on the same plane of existence as its master, the two of them can communicate telepathically with each other.

mmTelepathicShro.name: Telepathic Shroud
mmTelepathicShro.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s thoughts can’t be read by any means, and magic can’t detect its location or observe it remotely.

mmTeleport000000.name: Teleport
mmTeleport000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports up to [[lookup @range.value activity=dnoRMdFzhUUku26D]] feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

mmTendril0000000.name: Tendril
mmTendril0000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

mmTentacle000000.name: Tentacle
mmTentacle000000.description:
[[/attack extended]]. Hit: The target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of six tentacles, and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

The tentacle can be damaged, freeing a creature it has Grappled when destroyed (AC 20, HP 10, Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage). Damaging the tentacle deals no damage to the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and a destroyed tentacle regrows at the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmTentacleLash00.name: Tentacle Lash
mmTentacleLash00.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.acr.passive]]) from one of two tentacles, and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

mmTentacleSlam00.name: Tentacle Slam
mmTentacleSlam00.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=VC2iSwNPNaZ7M2bT]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=VC2iSwNPNaZ7M2bT]] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

mmTerrifyingGlar.name: Terrifying Glare
mmTerrifyingGlar.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=KjYVnRenWyJHktzg]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=KjYVnRenWyJHktzg]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. While Frightened, the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

mmThrash00000000.name: Thrash
mmThrash00000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmThunderbolt000.name: Thunderbolt
mmThunderbolt000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Deafened apply=false] conditions until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]’s next turn.

mmThunderclap000.name: Thunderclap
mmThunderclap000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Lq6GexegvlEVB6Dh]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Lq6GexegvlEVB6Dh]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Lq6GexegvlEVB6Dh]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Lq6GexegvlEVB6Dh]] feet.
